alert.note: Alert for Greene; Pickens; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 7:07AM CDT until June 18 at 7:45AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Pickens County in west central Alabama... Greene County in west central Alabama... Northwestern Sumter County in west central Alabama... * Until 745 AM CDT. * At 707 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Panola, or 18 miles southwest of Aliceville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Livingston, Eutaw, Aliceville, Carrollton, Pickensville, Forkland, Boligee, Union, Gainesville, Epes, Emelle, Memphis, McMullen, Panola, Walden Quarters, West Greene, Thornhill, Benevola, Johnston Lake and Bevill Lock And Dam. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
